## Platform Guidelines

### Facebook
- **Optimal post length:** 40-80 characters

### Instagram

- **Hashtags:** 10-15 recommended
- **Best times:** 11 AM - 1 PM
- **Content:** High-quality images required

- **Hashtags:** 1-2 recommended
